items.sentence: I am sorry to write such a long letter. I didn't have time to write a short one.
I don't care that my French sounds strange as long as I can get my point across.
Three of our children were born in Boston. The other three were born in Chicago.
Tom was seen on surveillance camera footage stuffing merchandise down his pants.
Tom bought himself new jeans, a checkered shirt, a suede vest, and a cowboy hat.
Tom felt sorry for the stray dog, so he asked his mother if they could adopt it.
Tom couldn't find Mary even though he said that he looked just about everywhere.
Tom didn't get fired because of what he did. He got fired because he was caught.
Even though she was trying to hide it, I could hear desperation in Mary's voice.
Every time Tom and Mary were about to kiss, someone came suddenly into the room.
